name: POWERBOAT Italia '88
description:
POWERBOAT ITALIA '88 is a frenetic speedboat racing game developed by Robysoft that combines old-school button mashing with precision maneuvering and timing. Up to 4 powerboaters storm their way toward the prospect of supreme victory and unending fame by boosting over hurdles, snagging powerups, and blocking the paths of their rivals. It's a true test of endurance... and a measure of just how far you'll go to win.

POWERBOAT ITALIA '88 originally was developed as  a custom 4-player arcade cabinet and comprises part of the Death By Audio Arcade. POWERBOAT ITALIA '88 was created by Nick Santaniello with design by Conor Birney and music by Audioghan.

To play with gamepads you will have to use keymapping software like Joy2Key to map the keys to your gamepad. The keys can be found in a text file inside the zip (POWERBOAT_KEYMAPPINGS.txt).
